Description.zhCN:
终极净化者战舰。可使用多重重构、热能射线枪、网道传送、无敌护盾和净化光束技能。能够使大范围的友方单位和建筑隐形。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
The ultimate Purifier battleship. Access to multiple reconstruction, thermal ray gun, webway teleportation, invincible shield and purification beam skills. Can make friendly units and buildings invisible in a wide area.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам оставаться на месте и атаковать противника в зоне досягаемости, при этом не преследуя его и не приближаясь к нему, чтобы вступить в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам курсировать между текущей позицией и выбранной точкой. Обнаружив противника, они будут приближаться на расстояние атаки и вступать в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в выбранную точку, вступая в бой с противниками, которые встретятся по пути. Указав в качестве цели конкретную боевую единицу, вы прикажете атаковать ее до уничтожения.

Tooltip.zhCN: 使净化者驱核舰以及周围的友军短暂无敌。
Tooltip.enUS: Makes Purifier Nuclear Destroyer and surrounding friendly forces temporarily invincible.

Tooltip.zhCN: 将净化者驱核舰以及附近的玩家单位传送至目标主控中枢或矩阵节点。
Tooltip.enUS: Teleport the Purifier Nuclear Destroyer and nearby player units to the target Master Control Center or Matrix node.

Tooltip.zhCN: 该单位能够侦测到隐形、潜地和幻像单位。
Tooltip.enUS: This unit can detect cloaked, burrowed, and phantom units.

Tooltip.zhCN: 对一条直线上的所有敌人造成100点范围法术伤害，最多延伸至16距离。
Tooltip.enUS: Causes 100 to all enemies in a straight line, extending up to 16 distance.

Tooltip.zhCN: 重构目标残骸，使其恢复为作战单位。
Tooltip.enUS: Reconstruct the target's wreckage into a combat unit.

Tooltip.zhCN: 该单位受损时能够每秒修复1+0.5%点生命。
Tooltip.enUS: This unit can repair 1+0.5% points of health per second when damaged.

Tooltip.zhCN:
净化者驱核舰将禁用主武器并停止移动来引导净化光束，持续20秒。
净化光束每秒对周围的敌人造成80(160 vs 建筑)点范围法术伤害。
若不手动控制，则激光会自动寻找目标。
Tooltip.enUS:
Purifier Nuclear Destroyer will disable its primary weapon and stop moving to direct the purification beam for 0 seconds.
Purification Beam causes 80 (160 vs buildings) points of area magic damage to surrounding enemies every second.
The laser will automatically find the target without manual control.

Tooltip.zhCN:
光束炮组：每秒对周围随机敌人发动光束攻击，造成24点伤害。
离子飞弹：每秒对周围随机三个敌人发动离子飞弹攻击，造成16点伤害。
Tooltip.enUS:
Beam Cannon: Launch beam attack on random enemies around every second, causing 24 points of damage.
Ion Missile: Launch an ion missile attack on three random enemies around you every second, causing 16 points of damage .

Tooltip.zhCN: 净化者驱核舰能够远距离部署净化者基础建筑。
Tooltip.enUS: Purifier Nuclear Destroyer is capable of deploying Purifier infrastructure over long distances.

Tooltip.zhCN: 使净化者驱核舰附近大范围的友方单位和建筑隐形。
Tooltip.enUS: Invisible to a large area of ​​friendly units and structures near the Purifier Nuclear Destroyer.
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.zhCN:
主要建筑
用于接收采集到的资源。可以使用时空提速技能。

开启：
- 探机
Tooltip.enUS:
Main building
is used to receive collected resources. You can use time and space speed-up skills.

Open:
- Explorer

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas.

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
折跃净化者地面部队。

开启：
- 警戒者
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Warp Purifier ground troops.

Enable:
- Vigilant

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启净化者防御建筑，可使用协议同步技能将净化者基础单位升级为精英单位。

开启：
- 使探机可以折跃质子炮台
- 使探机可以折跃护盾充能器
Tooltip.enUS:
Technological Building
Open the Purifier defense building, and use the protocol synchronization skill to upgrade the Purifier basic units to elite units.

Enable:
- Allows Explorer to jump Proton Turret
- Allows Probe to warp Shield Charger

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
能够为附近的友方单位和建筑恢复护盾。
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
Restores shields for nearby friendly units and buildings.

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启净化者高级建筑。

开启：
- 使传送单元可以折跃闪迹骑士
- 使传送单元可以折跃斥候
- 使传送单元可以折跃哨机
- 使传送单元可以折跃激励者
- 使传送单元可以升级为折跃单元
- 使探机可以折跃机械组装站
- 使探机可以折跃星门
- 使主控中枢可以折跃驱核节点
- 使主控中枢可以使用轨道空降和力场护盾技能。
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Opens the Purifier advanced building.

Enable:
- Enables teleport unit to jump Flash Knight
- Allows teleporter to warp Scout
- Allows Teleporter to warp to Spy >
- Enables Teleporter to warp Inciter
- Enables teleport unit to be upgraded to jump unit
- enables Exploration Machine can jump to Mechanical Assembly Station
- use Explorer can jump to Star Gate
- use Master Control Center< /c>Can jump to drive core node
- use Master Control Center can use Orbital Airborne and Force Shield skills .

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
净化者主力防御建筑。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
The Purifier's main defense building.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
提供补给，拥有补给是生产更多单位的前提。
为附近的建筑提供能量。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic buildings
provide supplies. Having supplies is a prerequisite for producing more units.
Provides energy to nearby buildings.

Tooltip.zhCN: 该单位正在恢复生命。
Tooltip.enUS: The unit is regenerating health.
This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Tooltip.ruRU: Эта боевая единица может обнаруживать замаскированные или закопанные войска в поле обзора.
